title: Smartphone Requirement Issue
content:
Hi,
I am a YouTuber.
I want to sponser your products.
I request you to please contact me so that I can send you my address to ship your stuffs to review and engage people about your company and products like smartphones, etc.
As, I am best to influence and know about technology.
I will get smartphones from companies like Apple, OnePlus, Redmi, Realme, Asus, Oppo, POCO, Sony, Vivo, Samsung, etc. in a week or so as I also contacted same.

Thanks & Regards,

Vishal
New YouTuber
